name: Asura Sight
text: Taking inspiration from the many faces of asuras, you have learned to split your focus to avoid being caught off guard.
prerequisites: Asura Style, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.
benefit: When using Asura Style, you gain improved uncanny dodge as a rogue of your character level.
text_zh: 从阿修罗的诸多面相之中汲取灵感，你学会了如何分散注意力免于措手不及。
prerequisites_zh: 阿修罗之型，基础攻击加值+9或武僧9级。
benefit_zh: 使用阿修罗之型时，你获得精通直觉闪避Improved Uncanny Dodge，你被视为职业等级等同于角色等级的盗贼。
